title: Riot? Sona E change now live? Not in the patch list
body: A just played a game of {{champion:37}} mid vs {{champion:268}}  mid and I noticed something weird on my lv 1 E song of celerity. It was fast as hell, being a Sona main, I know her E isn't that fast, but she could actually get out of Azir's Q fast. When I checked it, it said 30% + 4 due to AP scaling, at level 1. I remember her E being a time ago 15% movement speed buff to herself and I checked the patch to see if she had got a buff, and she's not even in the list. Did this slip through, cause the 30/32/34/36/38% (+8%/100 AP) was in the PBE and didn't make it live. I adore Sona but...when did THIS happen? Found it today after I did the patch.

replies.body: That's not intended, thank you for the notification. We're looking into it now.
I've reported on the PBE boards but I guess it wasn't fixed...
This is not an uncommon issue. Lots of things on the PBE boards are not noticed well enough, and never get fixed before release (sometimes for awhile after release).

The Sona changes on the PBE during the 6.10 cycle weren't intended to be part of 6.10. Goal was to get some more testing on more experimental stuff, then reassess. It looks like some of the changes at least didn't get properly removed from the patch before it went live however.

We're still interested in doing work on Sona sometime soon, but also still assessing which parts of the changelist that was on PBE did or didn't hit our goals.

Can I suggest somthing since your in a "Testing stage"

Potentially have the Auras on permanently with the effects also being permanent so long as they stand in said aura? I mean it would solve Sonas problem of "Build AP or be useless" and would reward good synergy with her team,

Also it would mean her Q aura isn't outdone by a damn item{{item:3504}} (Seriously this thing is FAR superior to her Q's aura at every point)
This was how Sona used to work before they reworked her last time. The buffs were much smaller, but if you were OOM, but still had an aura up, your team benefits so long as they stood in it.

I am aware of this as I played Sona way back then, but here's the thing, her old auras were much more powerful because she could hang pretty dang far back and give her allies alot of free stats at no risk to herself (Kinda like Soraka or Janna with her shield right now).

The problem with her now consists of multiple things

Her Auras power is absurdly weak alot of the times even when going full AP

Sona is(Was) Known as THE buff mage, she didn't actively contribute much outside of free stats and her ult but now...well... when you build full AP and an 2.2K item which is also considered meh to bad {{item:3504}} out performs your attack damage aura? you have a problem, her E aura is the only one which could be considered powerful but you'd need at least 3-4 major items before it hits that point, on top of this, it makes her build path VERY static, build full AP or......what? what else can you do? building tank won't do much, she's very squishy even with tank items and her damage and auras will be useless.

Her playstyle has changed but not her stats

How Sona was before the rework: You put yourself at risk to zone out the enemy with your early game damage and gradually transition to a more mid/backline support coming forword to ult (Which 95% of the time costs you your ult) now she's meant to be played as a pure poke support pretty much but still has the stats of her last playstyle

Itemization does not favor her

She was about auras, so what did you do as a Sona pre-rework, Build Aura items! literally own your title as a buff support fully and get all the aura items!

Aaaannddd most of them went or got nerfed to the ground, with only frozen heart being the only good aura option now

So what else can you do? refer to my argument that you can only build AP

Her "moments of strengths and weakness" are mostly just weakness

Her only damamging ability is on a 12 second cooldown and costs a good chunk of mana
Her aura is outdone by the Ardent Censer and if valid for only the next hit
The enemy team clumping up is pretty much a teams wet dream

Erm.... so where is her moment of strength again?

Here's the thing now, if her Auras were always on it wouldn't catapult her to pick or ban status which she was at some points

Her aura range requires her to get close to teammates, she has to put herself at risk now and the effects are different, I mean surley it would be right to reward a Sona for not only keeping close to a teammate but also avoid getting jumped on by allowing said teammate to keep the effect so long as they remain in the snuggle zone, and as for moments of strength and weakness, her weakest point is when she can't buff her carry which given her current Aura range is easy to do, her strong points is when her Q passive is up OR when a carry is being buffed by her and her moments of weakness should be when she's not got her Q passive up or isn't buffing her carry, which is an easy thing to do
